title: U.S. recalls over 200 million eggs in salmonella scare
text:
U.S. recalls over 200 million eggs in salmonella scare 12:35pm IST - 00:35 
Nearly 207 million eggs from a farm in North Carolina are being recalled from nine U.S. states after 22 people fell ill. Zachary Goelman reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Nearly 207 million eggs from a farm in North Carolina are being recalled from nine U.S. states after 22 people fell ill. Zachary Goelman reports. Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2HASze1
